column2: "Ah, <%me>? Sorry, I was thinking about something that happened."
"You've experienced your own share of failures, right?"
"I've had far too many. Thinking about them isn't fun, but you shouldn't forget about them, either."
"But I guess I'm still in the clear. I have people I can depend on to help me out."
"I guess it could be worse. I could be like that guy who has none of that."
"Sometimes, I think that if I had lost everything, then I might have turned out the same way."
"Sorry. I keep bringing up random topics around you."
"I'm going to continue on ahead. We'll catch up again later."
